ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 179
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, before the lifetap line was unresistable by ANYTHING, but now since they have added in the resistance factor, unless you have a lvl 50 ENC with the
ygData.messageBody:
Well, before the lifetap line was unresistable by ANYTHING, but now since
they have added in the resistance factor, unless you have a lvl 50 ENC with
the highest version of the Tishan spell (quest one) Necros are basically
useless on a dragon raid.Heat Blood line is heat-based so thats never gonna
get off on Nagafen, half the time the Darkness line is resisted by BLUES, so
thats a no go, and since the Dragons are lvl 53, it would be pretty hard to
get off a lifetap on then.Just my 2 copper

Aazen, SyVex

PS-Some of my replies will be to some older topics as my computer was in the
shop for over 2 weeks!<shudder>Those were 2 very boring weeks, btw :)
